>

</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Wand" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=164" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 141 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The pommel of this rose quartz wand resembles the stylized wings of an angel. When you cast its spell and choose not to make it [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), the crystal deepens to blood red. The color reverts to rose when you cast the spell from the wand nonlethally.

<document level="2" id="action-1831" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of a spell of the appropriate level. The spell must have a casting time of <actions string="Single Action" /> or <actions string="Two Actions" />, it must deal damage, and it can't have the [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118), or nonlethal traits.
